definition[0]: to decide not to do or become involved in something
example[0]: In the end, he pulled back from financing the film.
definition[1]: to get out of a bad situation or dangerous place, or to make someone else do this
example[1]: Many banks are pulling back from international markets.
example[2]: They are preparing to pull back their forces.
definition[2]: if a team that is losing pulls back a goal or some points, it succeeds in scoring a goal or some points
example[3]: Our play improved and we pulled back two goals.
